title: A Bid For Love
description: To FBI agent Asher Hall, offering himself to the highest bidder for a charity auction seemed like nothing more than good fun for a good cause. A romantic weekend in Italy, a chance to meet someone special, could be just what he needs. Until his anonymous "owner" turns out to be far more—and far more male—than he counted on.Fellow FBI agent Scott Jamison has one chance to give his heart to the friend and teammate he's loved for years. He's even willing to bankrupt himself for just two days with Asher, and he'll pay any price for a piece of the man's heart.But Asher knows the price might be too high. A gay man in the FBI? Teammates who are also lovers? That sort of love could ruin careers and destroy friendships.Can Asher bear to out himself, or will Scott lose his one bid for love?
author: T.D. McKinney
